fields.value: Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation

dsDescriptionValue.value: These data include files needed for or generated from phylogenetic, mutation rate, reciprocal best hits, and population genomics analyses.

publicationCitation.value: Rhiannon M. Peery, Chandra H. McAllister, Catherine I. Cullingham, Elizabeth L. Mahon, Adriana Arango-Velez, and Janice E.K. Cooke. Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation. Botany. 99(6): 355-378. https://doi.org/10.1139/cjb-2020-0125

fields.value: Here, we report new stem tissue transcriptome resources developed for lodgepole and jack pines subjected to biotic stresses from inoculation with two fungal pathogens.
